description: '''Trần Thị Minh Tuyết''' (born October 15, 1976, in [[Ho Chi Minh City]]) better known as '''Minh Tuyết''', is a [[Vietnamese Americans|Vietnamese-American]] pop singer, currently performing on Thúy Nga's ''[[Paris by Night]]''. Her sisters are [[Cẩm Ly]] and [[Hà Phương]] who perform with her as part of the cast of Paris By Night. She is known in the Vietnamese-American culture as the '''Vietnamese Pop Princess'''.
